author: adityapatwardhan
body:
ArrayList.Add() returns the array list size after the add. This causes the
value to be thrown on the pipeline. Assigning them to $null as we do not
need to know the size after addition. This causes errors and unnecessary
output on the AppVeyor console.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body:
@daxian-dbw Can you have a look at the simple fix. 

This is to avoid errors on AppVeyorConsole like: https://ci.appveyor.com/project/PowerShell/powershell-f975h (line # 10519 - 10560 and line # 10574 - 10577).

title: Assigned all ArrayList.Add() to $null
